scripts.ci:test: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d postgres
scripts.db:shell:auth: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U auth_user -d auth_db
scripts.db:shell:catalog: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U catalog_user -d catalog_db
scripts.db:shell:inventory: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U inventory_user -d inventory_db
scripts.db:shell:notifications: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U notifications_user -d notifications_db
scripts.db:shell:orders: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U orders_user -d orders_db
scripts.db:shell:payments: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U payments_user -d payments_db
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:infra && echo 'Infrastructure ready!'
scripts.dev:reset: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:up && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.docker:all: docker-compose --profile storage --profile search --profile messaging --profile services up -d
scripts.docker:auth-stack: docker-compose up -d postgres redis && docker-compose --profile services up -d auth
scripts.docker:catalog-stack: docker-compose --profile storage --profile search --profile messaging up -d && docker-compose --profile services up -d catalog
scripts.docker:orders-stack: docker-compose --profile messaging up -d && docker-compose --profile services up -d orders
scripts.k8s:dev:deploy: kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/ -f k8s/configmaps/ -f k8s/secrets/ -f k8s/dev/
scripts.k8s:prod:deploy: kubectl apply -f k8s/namespaces/ -f k8s/configmaps/ -f k8s/secrets/ -f k8s/prod/
